text: Consider the statements given below: S1: Tuple Relational Calculus (TRC) is a non-procedural query language $2: Tuple Relational Calculus (TRC) expression specifies what is to be retrieved rather than how to retrieve it Which of the following is the correct option? (a) S1 is true and S2 is false (b) Both S1 and S2 are true and S2 is the correct reason for S1 (Â¢) Both S1 and S2 are true and S2 is not the correct reason for S1 (d) Both S1 and S2 are false
